paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on genetic variants in the KCNH2 gene, including penetrance data.

functional_data.summary: The p.K897T_KCNH2 polymorphism can act as a genetic modifier of LQTS clinical severity in the presence of other rare variants in the same gene.

variants.additional_notes: The variant is mentioned as a common polymorphism that may influence disease severity.
key_quotes: In 2005, Crotti et al. demonstrated that the p.K897T_KCNH2 (MAF = 0.1871) polymorphism can act as a genetic modifier of LQTS clinical severity in the presence of other rare variants in the same gene.

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one variant in KCNH2 was found in the text.
